bug.question: I have six legs and like to crawl. I like picnics, but you might not like me there! What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I'm very small.
🍪 I like to eat crumbs.
🔴 I can be red or black.

bug.question: I am colorful and fly. I start as a caterpillar. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I have beautiful wings.
🌷 I like to drink nectar from flowers.
🐛 I used to be slow and now I'm fast!

bug.question: I make honey and buzz around. I live in a hive. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I visit flowers to get my food.
🍯 I make something sweet that you can eat.
🐝 I have black and yellow stripes.

bug.question: I am red with black spots. I am considered lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am round and small.
🌱 I eat tiny bugs that eat plants.
⚫ I have many dots on my back.

bug.question: I hop and jump very high. I am green and live in grassy places. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I blend in with the grass.
🎻 Some people say I play music by rubbing my legs together.
🦗 I am a type of insect.

bug.question: I glow in the dark. I am a beetle. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I use my light to find a friend.
🌃 You can see me best at night.
🔦 I make my own light.

bug.question: I build my home underground with many tunnels. I work with lots of others. What am I?

hints.text: 🕳️ I dig in the dirt.
🐜 I am like a team player.
🌿 I carry food back to my home.

bug.question: I am long and thin and wiggle in the ground. Birds like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪱 I don't have any legs.
🌧️ You often see me after it rains.
🌱 I help plants grow.

bug.question: I have big eyes and catch bugs while flying. I have a long, thin body. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am very good at flying around.
💧 I like to live near water.
🦟 I eat mosquitos.

bug.question: I look like a stick, so it's hard to see me. I eat leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I blend in with branches.
🌿 I am very good at hiding.
🍃 I eat leaves.

weather.question: I fall from the sky and make everything wet. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I come from clouds.
☔ You need an umbrella when I'm around.
🌧️ Pitter-patter, pitter-patter.

weather.question: I am big and yellow and shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🔆 I make you feel warm.
😎 You need sunglasses when I am out.
🌻 I help flowers grow.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I can look like sheep.
☁️ Sometimes I bring rain.
🌬️ The wind moves me around.

weather.question: I am cold and white and fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of ice.
☃️ You can build a snowman with me.
🧤 You need gloves when I fall.

weather.question: I blow the leaves off the trees. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I can be gentle or strong.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
🍃 I make the trees sway.

weather.question: I am loud and bright, and come with rain. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I flash in the sky.
⛈️ I am part of a thunderstorm.
💥 I make a loud noise.

weather.question: I appear after the rain, with many colors in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.
💧 I am made of light shining through raindrops.
✨ I am an arc.

weather.question: I am like rain, but frozen, and can hurt if I hit you. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am made of ice.
🤕 Ouch! I can bounce when I land.
🌧️ I fall from the sky.

weather.question: I am a very strong wind that spins around and around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I am very dangerous.
🏠 You should take shelter when I am near.
🌀 I look like a swirling column of air.

weather.question: When it’s very hot outside, you might need to drink lots of me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am clear.
🚰 You can get me from a tap.
🧊 Ice makes me cold.
